body_html:
``(pytorch_p27) ubuntu@ip-172-31-78-23:$ ls -lrt /usr/local/cuda
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 20 Jun 22 01:34 /usr/local/cuda -> /usr/local/cuda-9.0/
(pytorch_p27) ubuntu@ip-172-31-78-23:$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda-9.1/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.1/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/lib/nccl/cuda-9.1/lib:/usr/lib64/openmpi/lib/:/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib:/usr/local/mpi/lib:/lib/:/usr/lib64/openmpi/lib/:/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib:/usr/local/mpi/lib:/lib/:
(pytorch_p27) ubuntu@ip-172-31-78-23:~$ echo $CUDA_PATH
/usr/local/cuda-9.1

``(pytorch_p27) ubuntu@ip-172-31-78-23:$ ls -lrt /usr/local/cuda
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 20 Jun 22 01:34 /usr/local/cuda -> /usr/local/cuda-9.0/
(pytorch_p27) ubuntu@ip-172-31-78-23:$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
/usr/local/cuda-9.1/lib64:/usr/local/cuda-9.1/extras/CUPTI/lib64:/lib/nccl/cuda-9.1/lib:/usr/lib64/openmpi/lib/:/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib:/usr/local/mpi/lib:/lib/:/usr/lib64/openmpi/lib/:/usr/local/lib:/usr/lib:/usr/local/mpi/lib:/lib/:
